title: Victor .O. Oseji
text:
Twitter LinkedIn Github Email



As a seasoned data scientist, my journey began with a foundation in Pure and Applied Chemistry, sparking my passion for understanding intricate systems. With over six years of experience in the analytics field, I’ve cultivated a diverse background that enables me to bridge the gap between technical insights and strategic business decisions.
My career has flourished across industries, from e-commerce where I excelled as a BI Analyst, to thriving in the consumer goods and pharmaceutical sectors as a Business Data Analyst. This breadth of experience has broadened my perspective and deepened my belief in the transformative power of data.
Proficient in R and adept with Python, SQL, Power BI, and JavaScript, I possess a versatile toolkit to uncover meaningful insights and create impactful solutions. My grasp of machine learning concepts equips me to harness data’s full potential, fostering innovation and growth.
What truly ignites my passion is my curiosity for knowledge and collaboration. I thrive in diverse teams, crafting exceptional solutions that tackle complex challenges and unlock new opportunities. I firmly believe that data is the key to unearthing possibilities for individuals and businesses. This belief drives me to push boundaries and create outstanding outcomes.


In an ever-evolving data-driven landscape, I’m prepared to leverage my skills, experience, and curiosity to drive excellence and innovation. Let’s unite the power of data to craft a brighter, more insightful future together.




  
  
  2014
  Production Planner
  Sonia Foods Ltd
  
  2016
  Business Intelligence Analyst
  Dealdey Ltd
  
  2018
  Data Analyst
  Tolagram Group (MCPL)
  
  2021
  MBA-Marketing
  University of Lagos
   Snr. Business Data Analyst
  Imperial TM (WWCVL)

title: Victor .O. Oseji
text:
Services

As an experienced business data analyst and data scientist, my goal is to leverage advanced analytics to unearth actionable insights that drives informed decision-making, optimize processes and unlock new opportunities for tangible business growth, enhance customer experiences while maximizing ROI. I possess a comprehensive skills set that enables me to excel as a data scientist ranging from data manipulation and analysis to data visualization and machine learning applications. I am proficient in the use of R, Python, Quarto, RShiny, PowerBI & SQL for my data projects.









Data Analysis

I specialize in unlocking data's power across businesses with experience in ecommerce, FMCG, and pharmaceuticals, transforming it into crucial insights that empower informed decisions, guide through challenges, and drive business growth

(
examples
)












Data Visualization

As an experienced data scientist, I specialize in discerning complex data into insights with the use of both static and interactive visualization using tools like RShiny, Quarto, plotly, ggplot2, PowerBI and Excel to empower stakeholders in making well-informed decisions

(
examples
)














Predictive Analytics

I am experienced in using advanced machine learning to predict trends, extract insights from complex data, and drive growth through data-driven strategies for competitive advantage in dynamic markets

(
examples
)












Customer Understanding

I provide tailored customer understanding solutions using advanced data analysis and machine learning, enabling businesses to enhance decision-making, optimize experiences, and foster lasting customer relationships for competitive advantage.

(
examples
)














Collaboration

I excel in extracting valuable insights from complex datasets and effectively translating them into actionable business strategies, enabling informed cross-domain decisions and fostering cohesive teamwork towards shared objectives.

(
examples
)












Process Optimization

I provide comprehensive business process optimization services by utilizing data-driven insights to streamline operations, reduce costs, and drive sustainable growth through strategic implementation and tailored strategies

(
examples
)
